text: [Music]
as we started in the smart platform move
to containerization prior to that we had
quite restrictive deployment windows now
where houses moving to Micra so is we've
been able to deploy much more frequently
we've been able to move towards
continuous delivery in a number of areas
one of the great things we've had to
come from our move to Kiba Nettie's in
particular has been the ability to get
much more fine-grained resource
allocation which has lets us shrink
quite a lot of our deployments from
being well per core vm deployments to
have infractions of the core we've also
been able to use Prometheus to visualise
this and make that data available to our
developers so that they can see how much
they're things using how much other
deployments are using and then
collaborates together to make better use
of our resources
CSF have provided us with this approval
of these different technologies they're
ones that are recommended and we've been
able to adopt those in a very easy
fashion we do like that the CN CF is
vendor agnostic we don't have any fear
of locking of being the technologies in
the CN CF aren't being forced down one
company's sort of viewpoints we're not
being asked to commit to this one way of
doing things the vast diversity of
viewpoints in the CN CF lead to better
technology I'm also really looking
forward to more standardization of the
way we do certain things for example
we've got Prometheus and the communities
really coalesced around this way of
monitoring things which means that all
of the other tooling is all using that
monitoring so we get a very unified
stack out of that for us in the platform
team we're doing double duty as both
developing the platform and running
things on top of it we've found it so
much easier to do deployments and indeed
there's been people in Accardo have been
quite amazed at the can we do this on a
dev cluster and ten minutes later having
rolled out something that is now
deployed across the cluster and change
things for them
the speed from idea to implementation to
deployment is amazing
[Music]
